pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.3: “akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kammaṃ anihataṃ dunnihataṃ puna nihanitabban”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.6: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.12: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.8: dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena kataṃ, etaṃ yathādhammaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.10: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.12: “akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ punakātabbaṃ kammaṃ anihataṃ dunnihataṃ puna nihanitabban”ti ukkoṭeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.3.2: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṃ katan”ti jānanto ukkoṭeti,
